<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1beta/workloads/{name}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get details of a specific workload

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Workload name","in":"path","name":"name","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"created_at":{"description":"CreatedAt is the timestamp when the workload was created.","type":"string"},"name":{"description":"Name is the name of the workload.\nIt is used as a unique identifier.","type":"string"},"package":{"description":"Package specifies the Workload Package used to create this Workload.","type":"string"},"port":{"description":"Port is the port on which the workload is exposed.\nThis is embedded in the URL.","type":"integer"},"status":{"description":"Status is the current status of the workload.","type":"string","x-enum-varnames":["WorkloadStatusRunning","WorkloadStatusStopped","WorkloadStatusError","WorkloadStatusStarting","WorkloadStatusUnknown"],"title":"workloads.WorkloadStatus"},"status_context":{"description":"StatusContext provides additional context about the workload's status.\nThe exact meaning is determined by the status and the underlying runtime.","type":"string"},"tool_type":{"description":"ToolType is the type of tool this workload represents.\nFor now, it will always be \"mcp\" - representing an MCP server.","type":"string"},"url":{"description":"URL is the URL of the workload exposed by the ToolHive proxy.","type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"workloads.Workload"}}},"description":"OK"},"404":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}},"description":"Not Found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
